segments.text: My toothache started nearly a month ago . The pain's been keeping me awake . Would you please have a look ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Open your mouth , please . Which one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The one right at the back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid we can â€™ t save that one . It will have to come out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll give you an injection , then you won't feel pain .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( 5 minutes later ) OK , it's all over . Spit there and bite the cotton ball tightly in place for half an hour .
segments.speaker: S1
